summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Controle de Venda stock management application. Backend API tests achieved 100% success rate (16/16 tests passed). Frontend testing confirmed all major features working correctly including authentication flow, CRUD operations, scanner functionality, reports, and mobile responsiveness.

design_issues.issue: Missing accessibility descriptions for dialog components

passed_tests: Products CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Barcode scanner interface and manual input
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Currency conversion API occasionally returns 520 errors from ExchangeRate-API. Consider adding error handling or fallback mechanism. Also add accessibility descriptions to dialog components.

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all major features working, minor currency API issue)
